info.name: pCloud Dark Theme
info.description:
A dark theme for the pCloud because there was none.

I don't know if it works with pCloud Crypto because I don't have it, so please let me know if it doesn't.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.1.0:  Fixed share popup

v1.0.9:  Fixed Link bookmarks page

v1.0.8:  Fixed Link publinks page

v1.0.7:  Fixed Link page

v1.0.6: Made some Improvements

v1.0.5: Fixed Branding again

v1.0.4: Fixed Branding

v1.0.3: Added the ability to change the color from the audio player.

v1.0.2: Fixed the "invite friends" page.

v1.0.1:  Fixed the Repeat and Replay button.

options.label: option 2
options.value: body > div.megawrap > div.midContain > div > div.main > div.footer-new > div > div:nth-child(1){display:none;}body > div.megawrap > div.midContain > div > div.main > div.footer-new > div > div:nth-child(2) {display: none;}

options.label: dark
options.value: .sa-player.repeat-on.controls.repeat{background-color:#545454!important;box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 3px 0.3px #1bcad4;}.mnnew ul,.mnnew.leftdir a.sub,.mnnew.leftdir ul > a,.mnnew a.sub.opn,.mnnew a.sub:hover{background:#545454;}.XYkWH,.mnnew a li{color:#f2f2f2;}.eqoiCp{color:#c5c5c5;}.mnnew.leftdir a.sub.opn,.mnnew.leftdir a.sub:hover{background:#737373 url(https://pcdn-my.pcloud.com/img/sub-left.png) no-repeat center left 8px;}a.border-top:hover{background:#e31a1a!important;}.mnnew ul > a:hover,ul > .mnnew a.active,ul > .mnnew a.opn{background-color:#737373!important;}.mnnew ul > a.active li,.mnnew ul > a:hover li{opacity:1;}.mnnew a.sub{background:#737373 url(https://pcdn-my.pcloud.com/img/sub-right.png) no-repeat center right 8px;}.mnnew ul > a.border-both,.mnnew ul > a.border-top{background:#545454;}.mnew-heighter .mn-text .mn-title{color:#fff;}.mnew-heighter .mn-text .mn-explain{line-height:14px;font-size:11px;color:#c8c8c8;}.ebpoSO{background:#545454;}.fNThBs{color:#f2f2f2;}.kMMSZu{background:#545454;}.kMMSZu:hover{background:#737373;}.jbiCSp{color:#f2f2f2;}.jjLdrE{color:#b3b3b3;}.mnnew.bottom .tip .tip-inner{top:1px;border-bottom-color:#545454;border-top-width:0;}
